newsArray.title: Opinion: Lack of alternatives forced Man United’s hand with ten Hag
creator: Jason Pettigrove
newsArray.description: Don’t be fooled. When all is said and done, Sir Jim Ratcliffe and his board were left with little alternative than to back Erik ten Hag as Man United manager. One by one the potential replacements for the Dutchman fell by the wayside, and once it became clear that, despite a yearning for a Premier [...]The post Opinion: Lack of alternatives forced Man United’s hand with ten Hag appeared first on CaughtOffside.
